title: Evaluating GRPO and DPO for Faithful Chain-of-Thought Reasoning in LLMs
summary: Chain-of-thought (CoT) reasoning has emerged as a powerful technique for improving the problem-solving capabilities of large language models (LLMs), particularly for tasks requiring multi-step reasoning.
